sentence.text: We analyzed commonly reported European and Asian obesity-related gene variants in a Mexican-Mestizo population through each single nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) and a genetic risk score (negative regulation of apoptotic process) based on 23 selected SNPs.

ME attenuated the influence of positive regulation of macrophage derived foam cell differentiation rs512535 and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II rs361525 on obesity risk in FMP.

entity.text: positive regulation of macrophage derived foam cell differentiation
negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: We report associations for 6 out of 23 SNPs and for the negative regulation of apoptotic process, which confer obesity risk, a novel finding for Mexican-Mestizo physically active population.
